original_text: ‘Be careful not to do the same as the teachers of God's Law. They want people to think that they are important. So they walk about in beautiful long clothes. They like people to praise them in the market place. They choose to sit in the best seats in the meeting place. They like to sit in the most important places at special meals.
korean_text: 긴 옷을 입고 다니는 것을 원하며 시장에서 문안 받는 것과 회당의 높은 자리와 잔치의 윗자리를 좋아하는 서기관들을 삼가라

sentences.original_text: Be careful not to do the same
as the teachers of God's Law
They want people to think that they are important
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들이 자신이 중요하다고 생각하게 원한다

sentences.original_text: So they walk about in beautiful long clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 화려한 긴 옷을 입고 다닌다

sentences.original_text: They like people to praise them in the market place
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 시장에서 사람들이 자신을 칭찬하는 것을 좋아한다

sentences.original_text: They choose to sit in the best seats
They like to sit in the most important places
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 가장 중요한 자리에 앉는 것을 좋아한다
